message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
Take it or leave it, I'm not being generous!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't expect me to be too generous!
You're not being generous enough, I'll give you a chance to reconsider!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't expect me to be too generous... yet!
You're getting desperate, take it or leave it, I'm not budging!
I'm getting desperate, but I'll still try to negotiate a better deal!
You're running out of time, this is my final offer!
I'm getting really desperate, but I'll still try to get a better deal!
This is my last stand, take it or walk away!
I'm really struggling to make ends meet, but I'll still try to get a better deal!
This is it, take it or leave it, I'm not negotiating further!
